screenshots.caption: Edit and send captured packets with Bit-Twist

name: Bit-Twist (Packet Generator)
short_description: Bit-Twist is a simple yet powerful libpcap-based Ethernet II (IEEE 802.3) packet generator that comes complete with a comprehensive pcap capture file editor. Bit-Twist runs on Mac OS X (and *BSD), Linux, and Windows.
summary: Libpcap-based Ethernet packet generator for Mac OS X, Linux & Windows
